results.title: She’s 103 and Just Ran the 100-Meter Dash. Her Life Advice? ‘Look for Magic Moments’
results.abstract: Julia “Hurricane” Hawkins took up running at age 100. “As I get older, I feel like I only have so many 100-yard dashes left, and I don’t want to waste them in practice,” she said.

media.caption: Julia Hawkins celebrated after completing a race at the 2019 National Senior Games in Albuquerque on Monday. To stay in shape, she takes walks and works in her yard.

results.title: Germany’s €9 Monthly Train Pass Has Proved Popular (and a Pleasant Surprise)
results.abstract: To help offset inflation, Germany’s government has subsidized cheap train passes this summer. While many feared chaos and overcrowding on an overburdened system, it has been a relatively smooth ride.
